name: Financial Institution Organizational Structure
description: Example organizational structure for a financial institution showing enterprise, business units, partners, and collaborative teams

nodes.name: Global Financial Corp
nodes.description: Enterprise-level financial services organization providing banking, investment, and insurance products globally.

nodes.name: Retail Banking Division
nodes.description: Business unit responsible for consumer banking services including deposits, loans, credit cards, and personal financial products.

nodes.name: Commercial Banking Division
nodes.description: Business unit serving business customers with commercial lending, treasury management, merchant services, and corporate banking solutions.

nodes.name: Wealth Management Division
nodes.description: Business unit providing investment advisory, portfolio management, trust services, and private banking for high-net-worth individuals.

nodes.name: Operations and Technology
nodes.description: Business unit managing enterprise technology infrastructure, application development, cybersecurity, and operational support services.

nodes.name: Mortgage Services
nodes.description: Sub-unit within Retail Banking specializing in home mortgage origination, underwriting, and servicing.

nodes.name: Credit Card Operations
nodes.description: Sub-unit within Retail Banking managing credit card products, fraud prevention, and customer account management.

nodes.name: GlobalPay Solutions
nodes.description: External payment processing partner providing card network connectivity, authorization services, and settlement capabilities.

nodes.name: CoreTech Systems
nodes.description: Strategic technology partner providing core banking platform, hosting services, and ongoing system maintenance.

nodes.name: Digital Transformation Team
nodes.description: Cross-functional collaborative team driving digital innovation initiatives, mobile banking enhancements, and customer experience improvements.

nodes.name: Regulatory Compliance Team
nodes.description: Collaborative team ensuring adherence to financial regulations, managing audits, and implementing compliance controls across business units.

nodes.name: Customer Data Governance Team
nodes.description: Collaborative team establishing data quality standards, privacy policies, and governance frameworks for customer information across the enterprise.
